info.+content: A boy named Ikki Tenrio, using his Medabee, participates in Robattles; fights that square off robots, or 'Medabots', against eachother. Ikki must also stop the plans of the nefarious "RubberRobo Gang".
"Chie to Yuuki da! Medarotto (Wisdom and Courage! Medarot)" by Takeuchi Junko
"Yappari Kimi ga Suki! (Still I Love You!)" by Sendai Eri

title.+content: otoko no yume wa tairyoku da
